iaik.pdf.parameters

Class PadesLTVParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.pdf.parameters.PadesLTVParameters

  • public class PadesLTVParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Parameter class used to create PDF signatures according to profile PAdES-LTV.
    See Also:
    PdfSignatureInstance

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PadesLTVParameters()
      Constructor for parameters indicating that validation data and a document timestamp shall be added as given in the PAdES-LTV profile.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PadesLTVParameters

        public PadesLTVParameters()
        Constructor for parameters indicating that validation data and a document timestamp shall be added as given in the PAdES-LTV profile. Used subfilter for the document timestamp signature dictionary is ETSI.RFC3161.

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        public PadesLTVParameters clone()
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object

      • addValidationData

        public void addValidationData(byte[] signatureBytes,
                              java.security.cert.Certificate[] certificates,
                              iaik.x509.X509CRL[] crls,
                              iaik.x509.ocsp.OCSPResponse[] ocspResponses)
                       throws PdfSignatureException
        Add validation data for the given CMS signature (given as signature encoding).
        Parameters:
        signatureBytes - encoded CMS signature
        certificates - certificates to be added for this CMS signature
        crls - crls to be added for this CMS signature
        ocspResponses - ocsp responses to be added for this CMS signature
        Throws:
        PdfSignatureException - if the signature bytes can't be hashed or the certificates can't be parsed

      • addValidationData

        public void addValidationData(iaik.x509.X509CRL crl,

                              iaik.x509.ocsp.OCSPResponse[] ocspResponses)
                       throws PdfSignatureException
        Add validation data for the given CRL.
        Parameters:
        crl - the CRL
        certificates - certificates to be added for this CRL
        crls - crls to be added for this CRL
        ocspResponses - ocsp responses to be added for this CRL
        Throws:
        PdfSignatureException - if the CRL can't be hashed or the certificates can't be parsed

        Throws:

                                            throws PdfSignatureException

        Parameters:
        signatureEncoding - the encoded CMS signature
        Returns:
        the validation data for this signature
        Throws:

      • getValidationData

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CertificateValidationData> getValidationData()
        Get the map containing the hashed signatures as key and corresponding validation data.
        Returns:
        the map with all validation data that can be linked to a signature
